      Stolen and edited from: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/237159/whats-the-best-way-to-check-to-see-if-a-string-represents-an-integer-in-java Parses a String into an Integer or returns Optional.empty() incase it doesn't represent a valid Integer.

    • Method Detail

      • fixUrlIfNecessary

        public static java.lang.String fixUrlIfNecessary​(java.lang.String url)
        Puts http:// infront of the url if not it already has http:// or https:// infront of it.
        Parameters:
        url - the url to fix
        Returns:
        the fixed url or the original if there was no need to fix

      • parseInteger

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> parseInteger​(java.lang.String string)
        Stolen and edited from: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/237159/whats-the-best-way-to-check-to-see-if-a-string-represents-an-integer-in-java Parses a String into an Integer or returns Optional.empty() incase it doesn't represent a valid Integer.
        Parameters:
        string - the String that shall be parsed
        Returns:
        Optional containing the Integer or Optional.empty()

      • stringToBoolean

        public static boolean stringToBoolean​(java.lang.String toBeConverted)
        Converts a String to a boolean.
        Parameters:
        toBeConverted - the string that has to be converted
        Returns:
        true if the string equals true (ignorecase) or 1

      • getHexChars

        public static java.lang.String getHexChars​(java.lang.String string)
        Parameters:
        string - the string to print all hexadecimal values of
        Returns:
        hexadecimal values of all characters

      • humanReadableByteCount

        public static java.lang.String humanReadableByteCount​(long bytes)
        Parameters:
        bytes - that will be converted
        Returns:
        a human readable string (2000byte -> 2KB)

      • isValidURL

        public static boolean isValidURL​(java.lang.String possibleUrl)
        Checks if a String conforms to the uri format.
        Parameters:
        possibleUrl - the String to check.
        Returns:
        true if it was valid and false otherwise
